header.beta-status: These pages are being tested. Give feedback to help improve them. Go to current website
header.label: UK Parliament

hero.heading: Welcome to the Shunter + Pugin Components prototype
hero.paragraph-1: This application serves as an example implementation and quick-start for creating protoypes on Shunter with Pugin Components.
hero.paragraph-2: As well as the above, this projects has been setup with a package.json, Procfile and ProcfileForeman which are used by Heroku.
